summary: Iteration 2 testing completed. Fixed critical public practitioners API issue. Backend remains stable with 15/16 tests passing. Frontend core functionality working but identified routing issue with public profiles. Mobile responsiveness excellent. All CRUD operations and authentication working properly.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_issues.impact: Minor - both status codes indicate authentication failure

fixed_issues.issue: ValidationError for missing address/city fields in PractitionerPublic model
fixed_issues.fix_applied: Made address and city fields optional with default empty strings

integration_issues.issue: Public profile pages (/praticien/:id) redirect to homepage instead of displaying profile

accessibility_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent

passed_tests: Search functionality (city input and search button)
Registration page loading and form elements
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix public profile routing issue - pages at /praticien/:id are redirecting to homepage instead of displaying practitioner profiles. The backend API works correctly but frontend routing needs investigation.

success_percentage.integration: 90% (most flows working, public profile routing broken)
